name: Boundo
headline: Using generative AI to 10x outbound sales, all on autopilot!
description: Boundo uses generative AI to replace SDRs. Tell our platform who you're looking for, and it will find and contact high quality sales leads in a fully automated way! We’ve tuned our models to write near-human outbound sales emails with proven conversion. Best of all, we're using our own tool to do all of our sales.

founders.name: Simar Kohli, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO of Boundo - we're automating the sales process using Generative AI!

founders.name: Samik Shrotriya, Founder
founders.description: Recent Cornell University graduate working on automating outbound sales processes!

generated_description:
Boundo is an innovative startup with a sharp mission: to harness generative AI to supercharge outbound sales and do it all on autopilot. Founded in 2022 and backed by Y Combinator’s S22 batch, the company is nestled in the tech-rich environment of San Francisco with a lean team of just two employees.

At its core, Boundo aims to automate the traditionally labor-intensive role of Sales Development Representatives (SDRs). You tell Boundo who your ideal customer profile (ICP) is, and it goes to work—finding and reaching out to high-quality sales leads. It does this by crafting near-human-like outbound emails that have been statistically proven to convert well. This isn't just theoretical; Boundo uses its own platform for its sales efforts, demonstrating confidence in its capabilities.

With the goal of "10x outbound sales," Boundo is all about efficiency. It promises to save businesses up to $70,000 annually per SDR and claims to free up around 1,000 hours of work. The platform operates around the clock, allowing users to generate thousands of qualified leads in mere seconds by leveraging popular platforms like LinkedIn and email. Boundo also utilizes advanced deliverability technology to ensure that outreach efforts land in inboxes, not spam folders.

Beyond just lead generation, Boundo provides in-depth insights into engagement, tracking hot leads that are interacting with your content. Its AI-driven personalization ensures that potential clients feel like they’re receiving messages from a real person, not a bot.

Trust has been a significant theme in Boundo's early traction, with satisfied clients praising the platform as a game-changer for simplifying and improving the sales outreach process. 

For businesses looking to climb the sales ladder with a tech-savvy edge, Boundo stands out as an all-in-one tool that promises speed, efficiency, and a modern approach to lead generation and management. If you’re ready to scale your sales strategy, it might be worth your time to check out their offerings on [Boundo's website](https://boundo.com).
